A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
You know the tomato meter is paid bullshit when the audience score is near below 50%.

Very little about Last Jedi makes any sense. Poor directing\, poor story telling\, poor character development\, poor musical score\, am I missing anything? Without any spoilers\, if this is the direction of Star Wars\, then Star Wars is dead. Seems like something the Chinese market would enjoy because they don't know the back story and enjoy anything that's Western.

Then again\, in today's world\, everything is about money and numbers\, when anything is hell bent on maximizing profit\, quality suffers.
